YALLS EAGLE came in,bmp midway. SHEZA TRAIN BABY bumped midway. PER LOUISIANA RULING 25237, WENDELLS FAST DASH WAS DISQUALIFIED FROM FIRST TO UNPLACED FOR A MEDICATION VIOLATION.
